content: Just so you remember, I prefer meetings on Tuesday afternoons after 2pm.
Got it, I'll remember that you like meetings on Tuesdays.
My company email is alex@capsule.dev and it never changes.
What's the status on the launch?
Please remind me every Friday morning to send the weekly update.
I'll set a reminder for Fridays at 9am.
Ignore this, we were just chatting about lunch plans.
Call me Lex during conversations, that's what my friends call me.
My billing address is 123 Market Street, San Francisco, CA 94105.
